channel.title: Progressive Death Metal on Nischal Dawadi
channel.description: Recent content in Progressive Death Metal on Nischal Dawadi

item.title: Why I Think Prog Music Is the Ultimate Form of Human Expression
item.description: From the brooding depths of Blackwater Park to the soaring organ lines of Close to the Edge, my journey through prog revealed why I see it as the purest human expression.
